inclusion.criterion: 1-2 branches with the stenotic rate < 70% involved
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: mildly ischemic manifestation relative to activity but relieve after rest
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: no or low degree of organ insufficiency: NYHF I~II; eGFR (MRDR) ≥ 60ml/min
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Acute or chronic active infections including tuberculosis, hepatitis virus, etc.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Other autoimmune diseases including systemic lupus erythematosus, Behcet disease, IgG4 relative disease
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Successive twice relapse occurs even after the intervention adjustment ( for the benefits of patients)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function, EF was 25%, and had biatrial enlargement. He underwent cardiac cath with right heart cath to evaluate his pulm art pressures which showed no angiographically apparent flow-limiting coronary artery disease.
